column4: how do i find out what desktop enviorment is running. i had gnome installed but i did apt-get xubuntu-desktop and it installed. i want to know if its running instead of gnome
You would have to either uninstall GNOME or select XFCE at login to get XFCE
My bet is you're running GNOME.
If you can click the System menu and select "About GNOME" that's what you've got.
